committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that, for purposes of the civil service retirement provisions of title 5, United States Code, cost-of-living adjustments allowed to officers and employees of the Postal Service shall be considered to be part of the basic pay of such officers.

summary.text: States that for purposes of civil service retirement the cost-of-living adjustments allowed to officers and employees of the Postal Service and the Postal Rate Commission shall be considered to be part of the basic pay of such officers and employees.

titles.title: A bill to provide that, for purposes of the civil service retirement provisions of title 5, United States Code, cost-of-living adjustments allowed to officers and employees of the Postal Service shall be considered to be part of the basic pay of such officers.
